bossRadar.title: Boss Radar / Risk Level Monitor
bossRadar.description: Real-time (simulated) monitoring of office danger levels to help you slack safely and work efficiently!

absolutelySafe: Boss is on vacation, office is like a resort!
Boss is on a business trip for a week, enjoy your freedom!
All quiet, boss might be meditating on salary plans.
So safe you could organize an office badminton tournament!
lowRisk: Boss is in a meeting but occasionally comes out for water.
Boss is emotionally stable, good time to report trivial work.
Office atmosphere is peaceful, but don't slack too loudly.
You can slack, but remember to set up the boss key.
mediumRisk: Boss is in the office but looks busy, no time for you.
Insider info: Boss is in an average mood today, proceed with caution.
Office has KPI tension in the air, suggest working seriously for at least half an hour.
Boss's footsteps echo in the hallway, stay alert!
highRisk: Boss is patrolling! Pretend to work hard!
Emergency notice: Boss has started checking workstations one by one!
Boss is roaring, can be heard for miles! Quick! Open your IDE!
Office enters level one alert, non-combat personnel please evacuate to the break room immediately.
extremelyDangerous: Red alert! Boss specifically wants to see you! Run!... Oh no, go!
Give up illusions, prepare for battle! Boss wants to hold an all-hands meeting on 'Struggle and Future'!
System notification: Your 'slacking privileges' have been revoked, please switch to 'workaholic mode' immediately.

colleaguePersonaAnalyzer.title: Colleague Persona Analyzer
colleaguePersonaAnalyzer.description: By selecting descriptions from various dimensions below and adding specific examples, AI helps you accurately analyze your colleague's personality traits and behavior patterns.

communicationStyles.title: What is their core communication style?
communicationStyles.description: Choose the option that best represents their daily communication approach.
communicationStyles.comm_direct_desc: Clear opinions, no beating around the bush
communicationStyles.comm_logical_desc: Well-organized, focuses on data and facts
communicationStyles.comm_reserved_desc: Few words, but hits the key points

teamRoles.title: In team collaboration, what role do they usually play?
teamRoles.description: Think about their typical contribution style in team projects.
teamRoles.role_innovator_desc: Often has new ideas, challenges conventions

pressureReactions.title: When facing pressure or challenges, what is their typical reaction?
pressureReactions.description: Recall their performance under difficult or high-pressure situations.
pressureReactions.pressure_anxious_desc: May be nervous, but still tries hard
pressureReactions.pressure_seeker_desc: Will ask others for help or talk
pressureReactions.pressure_avoidant_desc: May avoid problems in the short term

conflictApproaches.title: How do they tend to handle work conflicts or disagreements?
conflictApproaches.description: Think about their common practices in controversial situations.
conflictApproaches.conflict_compromising_desc: Willing to make concessions for agreement

taskManagementStyles.title: In task management and execution, what is their style?
taskManagementStyles.description: Consider how they arrange and complete work tasks.
taskManagementStyles.task_planner_desc: Plans ahead, follows step by step
taskManagementStyles.task_flexible_desc: Adapts to changes, adjusts as needed
taskManagementStyles.task_procrastinator_desc: Sometimes delays, but can catch up

adaptabilityToChanges.title: How well do they adapt to work changes (process adjustments, technology updates)?
adaptabilityToChanges.description: Assess their acceptance and adjustment ability to new situations and environments.
adaptabilityToChanges.change_embracer_desc: Views change as opportunity, enjoys trying new things
adaptabilityToChanges.change_cautious_desc: Observes and understands before gradually accepting
adaptabilityToChanges.change_resistant_desc: Prefers stability, doesn't like changes much
adaptabilityToChanges.change_passive_desc: Can keep up, but won't actively seek change

learningAttitudes.title: What is their attitude towards learning new knowledge and skills, seeking personal growth?
learningAttitudes.description: Observe their performance in professional development and skill improvement.
learningAttitudes.learn_proactive_desc: Actively learns new skills and knowledge
learningAttitudes.learn_practical_desc: Focuses on skills that solve real problems
learningAttitudes.learn_complacent_desc: Lacks motivation to learn new things

supplementDescription.title: Supplementary Description and Examples (Optional)
supplementDescription.description: Please provide detailed descriptions of specific examples, behaviors, or other important information you've observed about this colleague. The more specific, the more accurate the analysis may be.
supplementDescription.placeholder: e.g., Once during an urgent project, John voluntarily took on the most difficult part, worked overtime continuously and also helped other colleagues... He always brings up key points that others overlook in meetings...
supplementDescription.guidingPromptsTitle: Or click the questions below to quickly add to the description box (content will be appended to existing text):

guidingPrompts: What are the three most impressive behaviors or traits of this colleague in daily work?
Describe their typical performance in meetings or group discussions.
How do they usually respond and perform when facing work pressure, urgent tasks, or emergencies?
Give a specific example of their role and communication style in team collaboration or projects.
How do they react when receiving positive feedback (praise) and negative feedback (criticism)?
How do they usually handle disagreements or work conflicts with others?
If you had to use three words to describe their communication style, which three would you choose? Why?
Please describe a specific example that you think best demonstrates their personality traits.
